title: What's News --  World-Wide
text:
CDC Director Walensky recommended booster shots of Covid-19 vaccines from Moderna and Johnson & Johnson and backed mixing vaccines with a different booster dose.

---

Democrats worked to quickly find new revenue sources to pay for their social-policy and climate package, seeking to target businesses and wealthy individuals in novel ways.

---

The House voted 229-202 to hold Bannon in criminal contempt of Congress for refusing to comply with a subpoena from the panel investigating the attack on the U.S. Capitol.

---

Rising global temperatures pose a growing risk to U.S. national security, according to a U.S. intelligence report that portrays climate change as a new geopolitical battleground.

---

The head of a Haitian gang holding 17 American and Canadian missionaries captive threatened to kill them if a ransom isn't paid, according to a video.

---

The NBA is facing nationalist umbrage in China after Enes Kanter, a player for the Boston Celtics, called on the Chinese government to free Tibet.

---

Actor Alec Baldwin shot two people, one fatally, in an incident involving a prop gun on the set of the western film "Rust," in the Santa Fe, N.M., area, the Santa Fe County Sheriff's Office said.
